title: National HIV / AIDS Policy Sri Lanka
decision_details:
- this is a communicable decease without a definite cure and prevention is the only option available to avoid consequences leading to serious mental, social and economic repercussions.  Two main broad objectives in this policy are -  

(i)	prevent the transmission of HIV/AIDS and other sexually transmitted infection in Sri Lanka through effective strategies including mother to child transmission and transmission to blood and blood products; and 

(ii)	improve the quality of life of people infected and or affected by HIV/AIDS and provide quality care and support to them.

Cabinet approval was granted for the policy documents submitted by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health.
